headline.main: QUICK NAZI DEFEAT IS SEEN BY WILLKIE; In Short-Wave Broadcast to Poland, He Tells People Not to Be Discouraged

lead_paragraph: Asking his Polish listeners to be neither "discouraged" nor "afraid," Wendell L. Willkie predicted in a short-wave mesage to Poland yesterday that "within a relatively brief period the democracies of the world will command both the oceans and the air."
abstract: W L Willkie predicts German defeat
